title: Specification Quality Checklist
description: An interactive checklist for evaluating the completeness and quality of MicroSim specifications before AI-assisted generation, organized into four categories: Educational Foundation, Visual Design, Interactivity, and Technical Details.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Quality Assurance
MicroSim Development
learningObjectives: Identify the four key categories of a complete MicroSim specification
Evaluate specifications for completeness before generation
Understand the relationship between specification quality and generation success

controls.description: Click category headers to expand/collapse sections
Click checkboxes to toggle completion status
Click Reset All button to clear all checkboxes
